document.masterDocTitle: The Euxanthine Crabs (Crustacea: Brachyura: Xanthidae) Of The Philippines

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The Euxanthine Crabs (Crustacea: Brachyura: Xanthidae) Of The Philippines

subSubSection.paragraph:
Alainodaeus filipinus Mendoza & Ng, 2008a: 55
, Figs. 1–4 .

materialsCitation.collectorName: Balicasag Is. & P. K. L. Ng & J. Arbasto & Stn. DW

subSubSection.paragraph:
Remarks. – This species was recently described from Balicasag Island (Mendoza & Ng, 2008a). It represents a remarkable range expansion for
Alainodaeus
, being found in the northernmost and westernmost extent of the known range of this genus. It is known only from the central Philippines thus far.

caption.paragraph: Table 1. List of euxanthine crabs from the Philippines, with geographic references and historical records. Species names preceded by an

subSubSection.paragraph: asterisk (*) are new country records.

Alainodaeus filipinus Mendoza & Ng, 2008 Balicasag Is.
, Bohol Sea (Mendoza & Ng, 2008a)

Cranaothus deforgesi
Ng, 1993 Maluso Bay
, Basilan Is., Sulu Sea ( Serène & Umali , 1972); Panglao & Balicasag Is. , Bohol Sea (this paper)

Crosnierius carinatus Serène & Vadon, 1981
off Lubang Is., South China Sea (Serène & Vadon, 1981);
Bohol Sea & eastern coast of Luzon, Philippine Sea, off Batangas coast, South China Sea (this paper)

*
Epistocavea mururoa Davie, 1993 Panglao & Balicasag Is.
, Bohol Sea (this paper)
Gulf ( Ward, 1941 ); Catanduanes Is., Philippine Sea ( Guinot-Dumortier, 1960 ); Luzon Is. ( Batangas , Cagayan & Sorsogon ), Lubang Is., Mindoro Is., Panay Is., Samar Is., Sibuyan Is. (this paper)

Euxanthus herdmani Laurie, 1906
Camiguin Is., Bohol Sea (Garth & Kim, 1983); Puerto Galera, Mindoro Is., South China Sea ( Serène, 1984 ); Panglao Is.,
Bohol Sea (this paper)
